name: CalHearts: My Heart Skips a Frame
name_original: CalHearts: My Heart Skips a Frame
description:
Dreaming of going to art school? Lonely? Perhaps there's a Cal-Heart shaped hole in your soul.

Introducting CalHearts: My Heart Skips a Frame! Made by actual Cal Arts character losers animators, let this dating sim take you on a journey and experience what being in the character animation program is really like.*  Who knows, you might just meet a special someone.......

*lmao
